```{r}
A<-matrix(ncol=4,nrow=4, c(3,0,0,0,2,1,0,0,1,5,1,0,7,9,8,4), byrow=TRUE)
A
sol<-matrix(ncol=1, nrow=4, c(-9,6,2,5))
sol
```

```{r}
n<-nrow(A)
valor<-vector(length=4)
for(i in 1:(n-1)){
  escalar <- sol[i]/A[i,i]
  valor[i]<-escalar
  sol[(i+1):n]<-sol[(i+1):n]-A[(i+1):n,i]*escalar
}

escalar <- sol[n]/A[n,n]
valor[n]<-escalar

valor
```
